title: How Many Calories in Toast?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in toast per slice, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown with tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: 1 medium slice (28 g) of white bread, toasted, plain with no butter, margarine, or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bread type, brand, slice thickness, and any additions; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One slice of plain toast provides about 77 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one slice of toast?
faqs.a: About 77 kcal for a plain medium slice of white toast.

faqs.q: Does toasting bread change the calories?
faqs.a: No, toasting doesn't significantly alter calories; it's the same as untoasted bread.
One slice has ~14.5 g carbs, with 0.7 g fiber.

faqs.q: What if I add butter to my toast?
faqs.a: Adding 1 tsp butter increases calories by ~34 to 111 kcal total.

faqs.q: Are there fewer calories in whole grain toast?
faqs.a: Similar at ~79 kcal per slice, but with more fiber for better nutrition.
